wikipedia_page.main: (George) Douglas Scott (Doug Scott) is  Honorary Entrepreneurial Fellow in the Business School of Durham University, and Managing Director at What You See Is All There Is. He was previously the chief executive officer of Tyneside Economic Development Company (TEDCO Ltd), Jarrow, Tyne and Wear from 1997 to 2013.

response: *George Douglas Scott, English chief executive officer
* George Douglas Scott or Doug Scott, chairman of TEDCO
